name: wc26-mcp
description: FIFA World Cup 2026 data — matches, teams, venues, city guides, fan zones, visa info, and more

tools.name: get_matches
tools.description: Query FIFA World Cup 2026 matches by date, team, group, venue, round, or status.

tools.name: get_teams
tools.description: Query all 48 qualified nations with FIFA rankings and confederations.

tools.name: get_groups
tools.description: Get group details with teams, venues, and match schedules.

tools.name: get_venues
tools.description: Query 16 stadiums across USA, Mexico, and Canada.

tools.name: get_schedule
tools.description: Full tournament schedule organized by date with timezone conversion.

tools.name: get_team_profile
tools.description: Coach, key players, playing style, World Cup history for any team.

tools.name: get_nearby_venues
tools.description: Find venues near a given venue, sorted by distance.

tools.name: get_city_guide
tools.description: Travel guide for any host city — food, transit, things to do, local tips.

tools.name: get_historical_matchups
tools.description: Head-to-head World Cup history between any two teams.

tools.name: what_to_know_now
tools.description: Zero-query temporal briefing that auto-detects the current tournament phase.

tools.name: get_visa_info
tools.description: Entry requirements for World Cup travelers entering USA, Mexico, or Canada.

tools.name: get_fan_zones
tools.description: Official FIFA Fan Festival and fan zone locations across all host cities.
